-- Shortcut handling
END ONLINE

ExpSyntax.val: IF ({0,5}>0,'INVO_DEBH_NO in (select DEBH_NO from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/DEBH where DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = '&Str ({0,5},'9')&')','INVO_DEBH_NO = '&Str ({0,1},'9'))&' and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_DEBC_DEBC, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_NO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AACTUALH, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVO_MARKCODETEXT, INVO_CODLASTDUNNINGLETTER from :1/INVO where :2 order by :3

SELECT ADMN_ADMNO_RATES, min(ADMN_CURRENCY), CAST(SUM(INVO_AACTUALI) AS DECIMAL( 13 , 2 )), CAST(SUM(INVO_AACTUALH) AS DECIMAL( 13 , 2 )) FROM :1/INVO join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = INVO_ADMNO WHERE :2 group by ADMN_ADMNO_RATES

Text.val: exit program
run User Action to Exit ODH

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_DEBC_DEBC, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_NO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AACTUALH, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVO_MARKCODETEXT, INVO_CODLASTDUNNINGLETTER from :1/INVO where :2 order by :3

Text.val: -- Print empty line
-- Prepare and print line with totals

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Admin number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Client number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor number ING')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor client')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoice number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Invoice date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Outstanding amount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Currency invoice')

Trim ({0,17})&';'&MlsTrans ('Outstanding amount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Currency heller')&';'&MlsTrans ('Due date')&';'&MlsTrans ('Markcode finance')&';'&MlsTrans ('Markcode text')&';'&MlsTrans ('Code last dunning letter')
